snippet: The House G.O.P. has attached an anti-environmental wish list to the must-pass transportation bill.
abstract: The House G.O.P. has attached an anti-environmental wish list to the must-pass transportation bill.
lead_paragraph: To get controversial ideas enacted into law, members of Congress use a clever trick: They attach them to otherwise unobjectionable, must-pass bills that fund crucial government services.

headline.main: The Dark Art of Legislative Hostage Taking
